show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Animal Planet
other_title: Eiga Doraemon: Nobita to Animal Planet (Japanese)
哆啦A梦 大雄与动物行星 (Chinese (PRC))
映画ドラえもん のび太とアニマル惑星（プラネット） (Japanese)
電影哆啦A夢：大雄與惑星之迷 (Chinese (Taiwan))
電影多啦A夢：惑星之謎 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: A mysterious pink fog takes Nobita, Doraemon, Shizuka, Suneo, and Jyaian to a planet populated by animals. Legend says that the ancestors of this population used to live on the moon, but were transported out of there to escape from the voracious creatures that lived there too. Nobita and his friends curiously explore this distinct planet until they discover the secret behind the strange fog.
